snippet.title: A Twisted Path To Renown | Gameplay Action Trailer
snippet.description:
A Twisted Path To Renown is available on the wishlist on Steam!

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2304660/a_twisted_path_to_renown/?utm_campaign=steamadsclip&utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=post

A Twisted Path To Renown is a new hardcore PvEvP extraction-based first-person shooter game, with deep and immersive survival mechanics and highly detailed crafting algorithms, set in 1899, United States.

Official Website: https://www.twistedpathtorenown.com/

                         ======= Links ======
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/8CucwfEWES
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/a_twistedpathtorenown/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/twistedpathtorenown/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TPTR_Official
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tptr_official/
Forum: https://forum.game-labs.net/forum/193-a-twisted-path-to-renown/
